full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Title:** A.6 Programmer / Software Developer and B.1 Business Analyst
**Reference Number:** cb-5956-29339373
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** 23-58012
**Publication Date:** 2023-05-29
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-21T14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-07-17
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-07-16

The National Research Council of Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the services of a Programmer / Software Developer and a Business Analyst to support the development of new functionalities in their Oracle APEX-based "Business Management Application". This application is crucial for the digitalization of the Council's construction product assessment service and publication cycles.

**Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
**Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

The successful bidder will be required to provide expertise in developing new functionalities in the Business Management Application, as well as supporting the business analysis and requirements gathering processes. The application is a complex system that requires a deep understanding of Oracle APEX and associated technologies.

**Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Bid Submission:** Interested bidders must submit their proposals electronically to the Council by the tender closing date. A copy of the RFP document can be found on the Canadian Government's procurement website.

**Contracting Entity:** National Research Council of Canada  
1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R6 Canada  
Phone: (613) 299-9650  
Email: Roxanne.AzziAbboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca

Note: All information in the original document has been kept, but restated in a more readable and concise format, as required.
 
Complete all the details in your rewritten entry as per your best understanding of the original document.
